item.title: Hosting a high performance static site with S3, Route53, & SSL via CloudFront
item.description: Update: Hugo I recently reconfigured my static website (still hosted at cloud.hierux.com) into a more feature rich site using Hugo - you’re looking at it right now! This allows me to make use of style templates and other feature enhancements while keeping things simple with markdown. You can find the Hugo-ified version of my website in my Github repo. I’ve hosted static sites using a number of different strategies in the past.
